name: The Missing (SolitaryStudios)
description:
The Missing

A short concept horror game about a streamer that went missing after visiting an abandoned building for his content.

NOTE: This game is just a short horror experience and will only take you 10 - 15 minutes of gameplay depending on you. I develop this in just 3 days so bear with me if you saw some bugs and glitches Thank you!

DONATION: If you want to support us, you can donate any amount. It will help us to make more games in the future. Thank you so much!
